description:
Location: City of Industry

Work: In Office 5 days a week

Bilingual: English and Chinese

Must have related experience and tenure of 3 years with current employer

Salary: $70K+

Benefits, PTO and all Included

Job Title: Shipping Supervisor
  • Key Duties and Responsibility
    • Microsoft BC software to Processing Order. Printing carton labels /Shipping Barcode Label.
    • Manage all important documents such as advanced shipping notice, pick slips, bills of lading etc.
    • Schedule Loaders with Transportation Carrier
    • Supervise and lead subordinates guide warehouse Loader/picker proper way
    • Submit daily orders sending EDI ASN, Invoices
    • Resolve issues regarding shipped orders
    • Handle Inventory Daily update.
    • Ensure compliance to legal regulations and company policies
    • Report to management on activities and issues
    • Submit Transportation (Ticket) Portal Access.
    • Responsible person of daily work order
  • Skills and Qualification
    • Organizational skills, detail oriented and ability to multi-task
    • Proven experience as shipping manager
    • Solid knowledge of logistics procedures
    • Experience in using EDI and preparing shipping documents (e.g. ASN)
    • Computer savvy with excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel)
    • Experience in directing and evaluating subordinates
    • Excellent organizational and communication skills
    • Attention to detail
    • Problem-solving abilities
    • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
    • High school diploma: Degree is a plus 2-3 years Logistics experience
    • Bilingual in English and Chinese
